column5: Where am I going, I don’t quite know Into the valley where the cold creek flows Is my boss cross because I didn’t show? Anywhere, anywhere, I don’t know    Drifting a float along a seam Floating a river of emerald green Flashes of chrome and silvery dreams Hoping a take from those unseen    The float pops under and line peels off the reel Torquing the rod for that one tight feel Gasping and sweating for a moment’s steal Thinking and mumbling, “this can’t be real”      Reality beckons and I’m tired and wet Excitement and relief, wipe off that sweat Into hand like a now tamed pet And back into water for freedom’s set    Friends amidst a flurry of fun Setting hooks and landing some            Hoping and praying for one last great run Leaving quickly when our misses rung…  Hope you enjoyed    P.S  Many thanks Jet and Ant for all the rides to the rivers on all those early spring mornings (and subsequent late nights) this season - Hard to ask for better fun. And Solopaddler for your never ending generous words of wisdom…Really appreciate it
That's all I can say!
very nice!
that was great!
Well done sir, that was great!  And the reality is you don't need any help from the likes of me.   (Very familiar looking water though, I must say.  )
Nice post! Me likey the poem  The location looks sweet!
Amazing pics..thanks!

Another great report MJL! The location, fish, pics and water all look fantastic.  Spring rules! My attempt at my first Steel on the pin begins tomorrow morning at 7am. I'll take this post as my good omen.
Nice work guys, and the poets mike lol. It's too bad I missed out this year ... but I'm just one exam away from freedom!
Awesome report, love the pics!
Great report Mike and beautiful fish. I`ll take you grand River carping if you take me steelheading .  Great fish man just amazing.
Sweet!  All of these river reports are making me want to get out!  Great job, and awesome photos
Your talents extend beyond fishing MJL...the poem was an awesome read!  Great pics and report bud.......   keep 'em coming!

Thanks guys for the comments…The pics were mostly taken by FrozenFire (Canon DSLR) and Jet (Waterproof Olympus) with a few from my Panasonic super zoom (which I did nearly dunk for the 3rd time)…The poem clicked the other night coming home from the river while half dazed and listening to Led Zeppelin’s Stairway to Heaven on the radio.
definately one of the best reports I have read on here man, great trip.
Mike, nice fish man!!!   Those pics are awesome!  Hopefully I'll be making my way in there next week sometime
fish are great but that scenery is awesome. i really need to get out of the east  lol nicely done bro
Very creative love the pics.
Awesome report Mike!!! I'm usually impressed with the fish porn rather than words in most people's reports....your fish were great and your words were even better!  -Ben
Very cool poem and pics!
nice scenery, good friends...and of course some steelies....and the poem... can't get any better than that
Great report!
